analysis.key_quote: In conclusion, the “Schedule Policy/Career” classification proposal poses a grave threat to the very core principles of good governance, civil service independence, freedom from partisanship, and the rule of American federal civil service law.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about undermining the merit-based civil service system and due process protections, while also emphasizing the risks of politicization in federal employment.
